quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
author: Camilla Eyring Kimball

quote: The most wasted of days is one without laughter.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.
author: Hafez

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Impossible is for the unwilling.
author: John Keats

quote: No pressure, no diamonds.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: When you have a dream, you’ve got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Stay foolish to stay sane.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: André Gide

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You are enough just as you are.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
author: Wilson Kanadi

quote: No matter what you’re going through, there’s a light at the end of the tunnel.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: No guts, no story.
author: Chris Brady

quote: Everybody stay positive no matter how negative life gets.
author: Juice WRLD

quote: Your mind must be stronger than your feelings.
author: Andrew Tate

quote: Gotta keep my head above water, gotta make it through.
author: NBA YoungBoy, “Untouchable”

quote: Never break or fold, that’s what it takes to be major.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: I know that now, and now is all that matters.
author: Beth Dutton

quote: Life is all about the evolution  J. Cole,
author: Change

quote: No matter where life takes me, find me with a smile.
author: Mac Miller

quote: I am the smartest man alive!
author: Billy Madison

quote: Once you really know yourself, can’t nobody tell you nothing about you.
author: Megan Thee Stallion

quote: Sometimes you have to take two steps back to take ten forward.
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote: Our future is our confidence and self-esteem.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Don’t be scared to live your life without judgment.
author: Lil Durk

quote: Be kind to one another, even when it’s not requested.
author: XXXTENTACION

quote: I am my inspiration.
author: Lizzo

quote: Look at the sky tonight. All the stars have a reason.
author: Lil Peep

quote: What a dog I got. His favorite bone is in my arm.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Only thing free in life is options.
author: Moneybagg Yo

quote: There is no way to happiness  happiness is the way.
author: Thich Hat Hanh

quote: I’m not afraid of dying, I’m afraid of not trying.
author: Jay-Z

quote: To lose your path is the way to find that path.
author: BTS, “Lost”

quote: I will not let anyone scare me out of my full potential.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Peace is the absence of confusion.
author: Wu-Tang

quote: Our weary eyes still stray to the horizon.
author: Pink Floyd

quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
author: John Muir

quote: I speak my own sins; I cannot judge another. I have no tongue for it.
author: John Proctor

quote: I work hard. But I play hard, too.
author: Pitbull

quote: It’s never too late to get good at something.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Wear your crown and go chase your dreams.
author: Summer Walker

quote: Life is what you make it, just don’t fake it.
author: G Herbo

quote: I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think.
author: Socrates

quote: Even a blind man knows when the sun is shining.
author: Grateful Dead

quote: I don’t like people around me sad. I like making people happy.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: It’s okay to start over, let someone else love you the right way.
author: Rod Wave

quote: There is no normal life, there’s just life. Get on with it.
author: Doc Holliday, Tombstone

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Haters keep on hating cause somebody’s gotta do it.
author: Chris Brown

quote: Keep your friends close, your enemies even closer.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: I’m just doing me, and to me, that’s what got me this far.
author: Lil Uzi Vert

quote: I attribute my success to this  I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
author: Beyoncé Knowles

quote: In life you always see the darkest days before the sunshine.
author: Polo G

quote: Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
author: Alan Watts

quote: Education and work are the levers to uplift a people.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Don’t wait for them to tell you. Tell them.
author: 50 Cent

quote: There can only be one king.
author: Pablo Escobar

quote: I paint flowers so they will not die.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: If I have a platform and a voice, I should use it for my people.
author: Bad Bunny

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Well, it’s hard to be yourself, it’s the hardest job there is.
author: Bill Murray

quote: Decide how badly you want it and proceed accordingly.
author: Robin Arzon

quote: Nothing is stopping me from doing what I love to do.
author: The Weeknd

quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Your river is strong. Let it flow.
author: Glennon Doyle

quote: Knock me down 9 times, but I get up 10.
author: Cardi B

quote: Damn right I like the life I live because I went from negative to positive.
author: Biggie Smalls

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: I found out that there weren’t too many limitations, if I did it my way.
author: Johnny Cash

quote: Nothing left to do but smile.
author: Jerry Garcia

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Never to suffer would never to have been blessed.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I become.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Suffering is part of our training program for becoming wise.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Sometimes it takes years for a person to become an overnight success.
author: Prince

quote: Luck is not a business model.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Behind every successful person lies a pack of haters
author: Eminem

quote: Time is a wonderful storyteller.
author: Deion Sanders

quote: Yesterday don’t matter if it’s gone.
author: The Rolling Stones, Ruby Tuesday

quote: I am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.
author: Al Capone

quote: An intelligent woman doesn’t get sad, she gets pretty.
author: Maria Felix

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I don’t want to end up simply having visited this world.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: The choices we make dictate the lives we lead.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: The goal is timeless. Chase the moment, and you lose.
author: Kid Cudi

quote: We’ve added years to life, not life to years.
author: George Carlin

quote: Fight with a happy heart and a strong spirit.
author: General James Mattis

quote: It doesn’t hurt to get more education.
author: Donald Trump

quote: We can be heroes just for one day.
author: David Bowie, Heroes

quote: You don’t get respect if you don’t deserve it.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: You must work in the dark for your light to shine.
author: Russ

quote: I don’t need a lot, I just want to find my peace.
author: Nathan Feuerstein

quote: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: What we do is more important than what we say or what we say we believe.
author: bell hooks

quote: Without education, you’re not going anywhere in this world.
author: Malcolm X

quote: If you learned a lesson it wasn’t a loss.
author: Lil Baby

quote: If you are not having fun you are doing something wrong.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The universe is not required to be in perfect harmony with human ambition.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: All humor is rooted in pain.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: Growth is in a series of mistakes. That’s the only way you learn.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You are not the opinion of someone who doesn’t know you.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: You pray for rain, you gotta deal with the mud too. That’s a part of it.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: Sometimes the heart is deceiving.
author: Halsey, “The Feeling”

quote: You must be the best judge of your own happiness.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Being realistic is the quickest path to mediocrity.
author: Will Smith

quote: Governments change… the lies stay the same.
author: Pierce Brosnan, GoldenEye

quote: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning.
author: Huey P. Newton

quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.

quote: You don’t have to eat less. You just have to eat right.
author: Dr. Sebi

quote: Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Good things come in good time.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: The heart’s memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Until death it is all life.
author: Don Quixote

quote: Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: The future ain’t what it used to be.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you’re alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The only person that has power to put boundaries on your dreams is you.
author: Trent Shelton

quote: When you get hard work, you get success.
author: Selena Quintanilla

quote: People can cry much easier than they can change.
author: James Baldwin

quote: In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: When you fail, you also learn how not to fail.
author: Soichiro Honda

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: You don’t have a soul. You are a soul. You have a body.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle.
author: St. Francis of Assisi

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: When I perform my role well, I feel proud.
author: Kim Namjoon

quote: Make each day your masterpiece
author: John Wooden

quote: Love truth, but pardon error.
author: Voltaire

quote: I think it’s important to hold a mirror up to society and yourself.
author: Ricky Gervais

quote: Luck is a word used to describe the success of people you don’t like.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: I just want to teach people how to be comfortable. Stop being so scared.
author: Jaden Smith

quote: The only way you can know where the line is is if you cross it.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: Our whole life is a meditation of our last decision  the only decision that matters.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: I would not think to touch the sky with two arms.
author: Sappho

quote: Laughter is the language of the soul.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: We humans are more concerned with having than with being.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Nobody promised you tomorrow.
author: Marsha P Johnson

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: John Lennon

quote: You have to realize that you are everything and more just on your own.
author: Jhene Aiko

quote: I’m in control of my destiny, never in doubt.
author: Drake

quote: Pain is never permanent.
author: St. Teresa of Avila

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: A change of feeling is a change of destiny.
author: Neville Goddard

quote: Keep working hard and you can get anything that you want.
author: Aaliyah

quote: Knowledge is really confined to experience.
author: Aleister Crowley

quote: You are your best thing.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: To use your head, you have to go out of your mind.
author: Timothy Leary

quote: Let us love, since that is what our hearts were made for.
author: St. Therese of Lisieux

quote: Attitude is a choice. Think positive thoughts daily. Believe in yourself.
author: Pat Summitt

quote: If you have the ability to love, love yourself first.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
author: George Orwell

quote: You can jail a revolutionary, but you can’t jail the revolution.
author: Fred Hampton

quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there’s some kind of pain.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: We all need people who will give us feedback. That’s how we improve.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I can’t feel my tongue. But I know it’s there because I’m talking.
author: Moira Rose

quote: See the good in that which is evil, and the evil in that which is good.
author: Hayao Miyazaki

quote: A dream is only a dream.. until you decide to make it real.
author: Harry Styles

quote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
author: John Lennon

quote: For any sin, we all suffer. That is why our suffering is endless.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Books are the mirrors of the soul.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Imagining something is better than remembering something.
author: Robin Williams

quote: In order to change the world, you have to get your head together first.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Maybe other people will try to limit me but I don’t limit myself.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Good things take time.
author: Gabriella Wilson (H.E.R.)

quote: Give me liberty or give me death!
author: Patrick Henry

quote: You must let suffering speak if you want to hear the truth.
author: Cornel West

quote: A dream deferred is a dream denied.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Everybody marches to a different drummer.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: If you want more, you have to require more from yourself.
author: Dr. Phil

quote: Don’t be afraid to challenge the pros, even in their own backyard.
author: Colin Powell

quote: I will not be triumphed over.
author: Cleopatra

quote: Anyone who does anything creative is always gonna want to change.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: The death of contentment is comparison.
author: Steven Furtick

quote: Somebody may beat me, but they are going to have to bleed to do it.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: Everything that happens before Death is what counts.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: The more ways you can tell a story and paint a picture, the better it is.
author: Ninja

quote: I see things that nobody else sees.
author: Melanie Martinez

quote: I want to build to that mogul, legendary level.
author: Lil Nas X

quote: A friend is one soul abiding in two bodies.
author: Diogenes of Sinope

quote: If you really want something, you can figure out how to make it happen.
author: Cher

quote: Nothing really scares me, to be honest.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: If nobody makes you do it, it counts as fun.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Everything is practice.
author: Pele

quote: Don’t give up at halftime. Concentrate on winning the second half.
author: Paul Bryant

quote: To me, there is nothing complicated about ordinary equality.
author: Alice Paul

quote: I never expect a perfect work from an imperfect man.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: Education is the best weapon for peace.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Nothing in life is promised except death.
author: Kanye West

quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: The more you live, the less you die.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: There must always be a remedy for wrong and injustice if we only know how to find it.
author: Ida B. Wells

quote: Nobody’s free until everybody’s free.
author: Fannie Lou Hamer

quote: The aim is to balance the terror of being alive with the wonder of being alive.
author: Carlos Castaneda

quote: Every team has its weakness, and every team has its strength.
author: Booger McFarland

quote: The quest for meaning is the key to mental health and human flourishing.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: I have never known any distress that an hour’s reading did not relieve.
author: Montesquieu

quote: You were not born to be a second-hander.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: You go out and do the best you can and hope it works. You just try to improve.
author: Mike Leach

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: No one else has ever opened doors for me. I opened them myself.
author: Jenni Rivera

quote: Freedom means choices.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: Face reality as it is, not as it was, or as you wish it to be.
author: Jack Welch

quote: One year of love is better than a lifetime alone.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: No matter how slow you go you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
author: CT Fletcher

quote: Keep going. Be all in.
author: Bryan Hutchinson

quote: Leave no stone unturned.
author: Euripides

quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I’m possible!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It isn’t where you came from. It’s where you’re going that counts.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: If it matters to you, you’ll find a way.
author: Charlie Gilkey

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Dr. Robert Schuller

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Don’t wait, the time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Life is fragile. We’re not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you’ve got.
author: Tim Cook

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.  If you’re enjoying these quotes, make sure to read our collection of  quotes celebrating success, love & life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.
author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quote: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: We have a responsibility to help those around us and help others in need.
author: Virginia Williams

quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of others.   (see more  quotes)
author: Charles Dickens

quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: The only thing that can grow is the thing you give energy to.  If you’re enjoying these quotes, make sure to read our collection of  quotes on living a great life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: No greater gift there is, than a generous heart.
author: Yoda

quote: Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: You can if you think you can.
author: George Reeves

quote: Worrying is like paying a debt you don’t owe.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
author: George Santanaya

quote: Get to the point where you get allergic to average! You don’t think average!
author: Eric Thomas

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday because I was a different person then.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I’d rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I am not.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I don’t think of all the misery, but of the beauty that still remains.
author: Anne Frank

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: There is no saint without a past, no sinner without a future.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Every noble work is at first impossible.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
author: Edwin Markham

quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
author: Mario Fernández

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right  for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens.  er
author: Helen Kell

quote: The question is not what you look at, but what you see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: Begin anywhere.
author: John Cage

quote: Have faith in yourself and in the future.
author: Ted Kennedy

quote: Despite the forecast, live like it’s spring.
author: Lily Pulitzer

quote: Do it Now!
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: No great thing is created suddenly.
author: Epictetus

quote: And in the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It is the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forward.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Man doesn’t know what he is capable of until he is asked.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Courage is fear that has said its prayers.
author: Dorothy Bernard

quote: Life is as easy or as hard as you think it is.
author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quote: Live your dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: The true vocation of man is to find his way for himself.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: A life of sacrifice is the pinnacle of art, and is full of true joy.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No wind favors he who has no destined port.
author: Montaigne

quote: It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Men do less than they ought unless they do all they can.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
author: Anais Nin

quote: A clever man commits no minor blunders.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Be not afraid of going slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: If I’m gonna tell a real story, I’m gonna start with my name.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: George Horace Lorimer

quote: All limitations are self-imposed.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: When you make a choice, you change the future.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Determine your priorities and focus on them.  If you’re enjoying these quotes, make sure to read our collection of priority quotes that will help you clarify what’s important to you in your life.
author: Eileen McDargh

quote: Words are your paintbrush, and your life is the canvas. You can paint whatever you want to paint.
author: Miguel Ruiz

quote: Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
author: Moliere

quote: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.  If you’re enjoying these quotes, read our collection of  quotes from the iconic poet.
author: Rumi

quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: If you tell the truth you don’t have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Re-examine all you have been told. Dismiss what insults your soul.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Have enough courage to start and enough heart to finish.
author: Jessica N. S. Yourko

quote: With our thoughts, we make the world.
author: Buddhist proverb

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Don’t you know your imperfections is a blessing?
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: You can’t have everything. Where would you put it?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Tough times never last but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schiuller

quote: Magic always happens when you direct your inner powers to the object you want to change.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quote: I could agree with you but then we’d both be wrong.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it.
author: Nike

quote: Those at the top of the mountain didn’t fall there.
author: Marcus Washling

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Mostly, the world sees you the way you see yourself.
author: Lisa Nichols

quote: The meaning of life is to give life meaning.
author: Ken Hudgins

quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
author: Joe Girard

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: May you live every day of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Two wrongs don’t make a right, but they make a good excuse.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: When in doubt, throw doubt out and have a little faith….
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: Don’t worry about the challenges. Get excited about the rewards of crushing them.
author: Hiral Nagda

quote: Keep going. Is not as difficult as you feel it is. Don’t give up.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: I may stumble. I may fall. I may cry. But I’ll NEVER give up! Tomorrow, I rise again.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Keep going like there’s a big rock rolling behind you. Never stop until you find ways to dodge it!
author: I’m salmiah

quote: There are a thousand reasons to live this life, every one of them is sufficient.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: If beautiful lilies bloom in ugly waters, you too can blossom in ugly situations.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what is still possible to do.
author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quote: Isn’t it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Breault

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
author: Urijah Faber

quote: Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
author: John Heywood

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Don’t get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: My life is my message.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You receive from the world what you give to the world.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: All progress takes place outside of your comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I don’t need it to be easy, I need it to be worth it.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you love life, don’t waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Energy and initiative count as much as talent and luck.
author: Will Peters

quote: As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You define your own life. Don’t let other people write your script.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Spread love everywhere you go.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
author: Kesha

quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: There can be glory in failure and despair in success.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: None preaches better than the ant, and she says nothing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A man’s true wealth is the good he does in the world.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it!
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: If you want to see a rainbow you have to learn to see the rain.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I’m a slow walker, but I never walk back.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You can’t live an exceptional life by being normal.
author: Nick Maley

quote: Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: To know how much there is to know is the beginning of learning to live.
author: Dorothy West

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Goal setting is the secret to a compelling future.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: A place for everything, everything in its place.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We will either find a way, or make one.
author: Hannibal

quote: Ah, but a man’s reach should exceed his grasp, Or what’s a heaven for?
author: Robert Browning

quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and II took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible but not simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t  you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it’s yours.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: It’s kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney

quote: To think too long about doing a thing often becomes its undoing.
author: Eva Young

quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: I don’t walk away from things I think are unfinished.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Shoot for the moon, even if you fail, you’ll land among the stars.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: You’ll never find a rainbow if you’re looking down.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Great things happen to those who don’t stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I kept always two books in my pocket, one to read, one to write in.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The higher we soar the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Tolstoy Leo

quote: There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: I am a part of all that I have met.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: No one really knows why they are alive until they know what they’d die for.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life’s coming attractions.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
author: Kobe Yamada

quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: It may be that those who do most, dream most.
author: Stephen Butler Leacock

quote: Nothing happens unless we first dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.
author: James Dean

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Life without dreams is like a bird with a broken wing  it can’t fly.
author: Dan Peña

quote: If your dreams don’t scare you, they are too small.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Skill is only developed by hours and hours of work.
author: Usain Bolt

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you’ll land among the stars.
author: Les Brown

quote: Procrastination makes easy things hard and hard things harder.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Ninety-nine percent of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Quietly endure, silently suffer and patiently wait.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Some roses grow through concrete. Remember that.
author: Brandi L. Bates

quote: Life’s struggles are necessary for growth.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: We must meet the challenge rather than wish it were not before us.
author: William J. Brennan, Jr

quote: The triumph can’t be had without the struggle.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Sometimes when hardships knock, it’s just life. Do not take it personal.
author: Naide Obiang

quote: Hard times always lead to something great.
author: Betsey Johnson

quote: Once you make it to your point of making it, you’ll appreciate the struggle.
author: Nas

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: E. E. Cummings

quote: Success is defined in units of fun. It’s all about being happy.
author: Jake Nickell

quote: When people try to tell you who you are, don’t believe them.
author: Maria Popova

quote: Anything can be done, as long as you truly believe it.
author: Ashley Qualls

quote: Life will never conform to all of our desires. Ever.
author: Mark Manson

quote: Stay focused and work hard  nothing in life is for free.
author: Krystle Ng-A-Mann

quote: If you’re making mistakes it means you’re out there doing something.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: The smallest thing, well done, becomes artistic.
author: William Matthews

quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: If you start with nothing and end up with nothing, there’s nothing lost.
author: Michael Dunlop

quote: Develop success from failures.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
author: W. P. Kinsella

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
author: Vernon Sanders Law

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: A queen is not afraid to fail
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
author: Sid Caesar

quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Horace

quote: Remember, success is a journey not a destination. Have faith in your ability. You will do just fine.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: No matter what happens, or how bad it seems today, life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Continuous effort  not strength or intelligence  is the key to unlocking our potential.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Your worth consists in what you are and not in what you have.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: You can always look up to others for inspiration but never for comparison.
author: Angel Graff

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale
